PRIVACY POLICY

Lumi Vietnam knows how important privacy is to our customers, especially in the context of increasing concerns over data collection and privacy. We want to make sure you understand how we collect and use your personal information. 

At Lumi Vietnam, we believe that true privacy relies on great security. For your privacy, Lumi Vietnam does not sell, rent or loan any identifiable information at the individual level regarding its customers to any third party. Any information you give us is held with the utmost care and security.

This privacy policy sets out how Lumi Vietnam collects and uses the personal information you provide us. 

—————

HOW WE USE AND SHARE YOUR INFORMATION

We use the information we collect about you for the following purposes:

– To communicate with you about our products and services

– To customize and improve the service for you

– To promote and drive engagement with us

– For advertising purposes

– For matters which you have specifically consent to

Additionally, we may also share your personal information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, search warrants or other lawful requests for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

—————

CONTACT US

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e‑mail at cskh@lumi.vn or hotline: 0904 665 965.

Address: No. 38, Do Duc Duc Street, Nam Tu Liem District, Hanoi.

Last update: October 6th, 2021.
